thread.title: Venus Williams reaches semifinals at Hong Kong Open
thread.title_full: Tennis: Venus Williams reaches semifinals at Hong Kong Open - Omni Sports - Sports - Ahram Online

author: english.ahram.org.eg
title: Venus Williams reaches semifinals at Hong Kong Open
text:
Related Tennis: Venus Williams eases into quarterfinals of Hong Kong Open Tennis: Venus Williams rallies to advance to 2nd round in Hong Kong Venus Williams closed in on a spot in the season-ending WTA Finals by beating Alize Cornet 6-1, 6-1 Friday to reach the Hong Kong Open semifinals.
The third-seeded American, a seven-time Grand Slam champion, won the Wuhan Open this month.
Williams will next meet either Jelena Jankovic or Daria Gavrilova.
Angelique Kerber and Samantha Stosur also advanced, and will face each other in the semifinals. Stosur beat Heather Watson 4-6, 6-3, 6-0 while Kerber defeated Caroline Garcia 7-5, 6-3.
''I lost my way at the outset but being a three-set match, I didn't let it bother me,'' said Stosur, the 2011 U.S. Open champion. ''It doesn't matter if you don't start fantastic, what matters is how you finish.''
